title: Főnök inkognitóban
overview: The boss is everywhere. A well-known sentence only comes to light for employees when it all becomes a reality. In the show, the managers and owners of the company are facing a completely new challenge. Disguised as a new employee, they observe what is happening in certain areas of their company, in certain work processes, when employees think the boss is away. In addition to the corporate background, we can also learn about the personal stories of employees.
